description.value: Orders collection resource used to create new orders.
lists all orders of a specific user
use to query all orders of a user
the amount of elements of each result page

examples.name: single-order
multiple-orders

body.name: application/json

items.name: Order
items.toXmlSchema:
<schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://validationnamespace.raml.org" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://validationnamespace.raml.org">
    <element name="Order" type="tns:Order"/>
    <complexType name="Order">
        <sequence>
            <element name="order_id">
                <simpleType>
                    <restriction base="string"/>
                </simpleType>
            </element>
            <element name="creation_date">
                <simpleType>
                    <restriction base="string"/>
                </simpleType>
            </element>
            <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="ProductItem" type="tns:ProductItem"/>
            <any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" processContents="skip"/>
        </sequence>
    </complexType>
    <complexType name="ProductItem">
        <sequence>
            <element name="product_id">
                <simpleType>
                    <restriction base="string"/>
                </simpleType>
            </element>
            <element name="quantity">
                <simpleType>
                    <restriction base="integer"/>
                </simpleType>
            </element>
            <any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" processContents="skip"/>
        </sequence>
    </complexType>
</schema>
